perturbation.original_text:
Party A: Rise (Tianjin) Education Information Consulting Co., Ltd. ("Service Provider")

Address: Room C209, C210, C213, C214, C217 and C218, 2/F, Building 1, No. 8 Huanhe West Road, Airport Economic Zone, Tianjin, China

Party B: [•] ("Service Recipient")

Address: [•]
perturbation.changed_text:
Party A: Rise (Tianjin) Education Information Consulting Co., Ltd. ("Consultant")

Address: Room C209, C210, C213, C214, C217 and C218, 2/F, Building 1, No. 8 Huanhe West Road, Airport Economic Zone, Tianjin, China

Party B: [•] ("Client")

Address: [•]
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Service Provider' to 'Consultant' and 'Service Recipient' to 'Client' introduces ambiguity. Later sections referring to the original terms will create confusion about the involved parties and their obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Service Recipient shall pay Service Provider the [service fees]/ [commissions and service fees] ([collectively,] "Service Fee") (inclusive of all applicable taxes) in accordance with Schedule 1 for the Services provided by Service Provider.
perturbation.changed_text: Client shall provide to Consultant the [service fees]/ [commissions and service fees] ([collectively,] "Compensation") (inclusive of all applicable taxes) in accordance with Schedule 1 for the Services rendered by Consultant.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Service Fee' to 'Compensation,' 'Service Recipient' to 'Client,' 'Service Provider' to 'Consultant' and 'Services provided' to 'Services Rendered', introduces ambiguity. Since the initial definition uses different terminology, later sections referring to the original terms will create confusion about the amount to be paid and to whom.

perturbation.original_text: During the term of this Agreement, Service Recipient shall pay to Service Provider the Service Fee on a quarterly basis. The amount of the Service Fee shall be [determined on the basis of the actual costs incurred by Service Provider in connection with its provision of the services, plus a mark-up at a percentage as agreed upon between both Parties, to be allocated to Service Recipient and other service recipients in proportion to their respective revenues] / [computed at a percentage (as agreed upon between both Parties) of Service Recipient's revenues] and confirmed by a letter of confirmation substantially in the form attached hereto.
perturbation.changed_text: During the term of this Agreement, the Customer shall remunerate the Supplier the agreed price on a quarterly basis. The amount of the remuneration shall be determined based on a separate agreement or schedule, and confirmed in writing between both entities.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Service Recipient' with 'Customer', 'Service Provider' with 'Supplier', 'Service Fee' with 'remuneration', and removing specific details about calculation creates confusion. Whether these terms refer to the same entities and method of calculation as defined earlier becomes unclear.
